error.signature: Error acquiring the state lock: ConditionalCheckFailedException: The conditional request failed
error.regex: (Error acquiring the state lock|ConditionalCheckFailedException|state lock .+ conflict|Lock Info)

verdict.summary: Another Terraform process holds the state lock, or a previous run left a stale lock behind.

dead_ends.action: Delete the DynamoDB lock table to clear the lock
dead_ends.why_fails: Deleting the table removes all locking protection and may cause state corruption from concurrent operations

dead_ends.action: Run terraform apply with -lock=false to bypass
dead_ends.why_fails: Bypassing locks risks concurrent state modifications and state file corruption

workarounds.action: Use terraform force-unlock with the lock ID after verifying no other process is running
workarounds.how: terraform force-unlock LOCK_ID (the lock ID is shown in the error message)

workarounds.action: Wait for the other Terraform operation to complete
workarounds.how: Check the Lock Info in the error for who holds the lock; verify with CI/CD system if a pipeline is running

leads_to.condition: Force-unlock during active operation can corrupt state

preceded_by.condition: Previous state lock error left stale lock behind

frequently_confused_with.distinction: State lock error is general locking failure; state lock conflict specifically involves DynamoDB conditional check failures from concurrent access
